description: This program resamples a volume onto a surface of a subject or the sphere. The output can be viewed on the surface (using tksurfer) or can be used for surface-based intersubject averaging.

registration_file.title: Registration File
registration_file.description: Registration file as computed by tkregister, spmregister, bbregister, etc.

output_path.title: Output Path
output_path.description: Output path for the resampled volume

reference_volume.title: Reference Volume
reference_volume.description: Reference volume name, default is orig.mgz

regheader_subject.title: Regheader Subject
regheader_subject.description: Compute registration from header information, aligning the current volume with the subject/mri/orig.mgz

target_subject.title: Target Subject
target_subject.description: Target subject for resampling, can be a subject name or 'ico' for icosahedron

hemisphere.title: Hemisphere
hemisphere.description: Hemisphere to process: lh = left hemisphere or rh = right hemisphere

surface.title: Target Surface
surface.description: Target surface on which to resample, default is 'white'
